item.title: How I Blog
item.description: Not surprisingly, given my semi random content, I arrive at my posts a few different ways. 1. I better write this down or Iâ€™ll never remember it These posts are the result of a rather frustrating night of problem solving. After reading tons of documentation and googling around, reading forums and discussing on IRC I finally got it working. Now I better write it down so I know how to do it next time.
